comments.body: The prizes are in Bitcoin BTC? and what NFT can be won?

comments.author: Crypto Birds
comments.body: Quote from: cryptochica on September 12, 2022, 08:40:37 PMThe prizes are in Bitcoin BTC? and what NFT can be won?  Winners of the Crypto Birds Fantasy League Season 1 will split 85,000 XCB and 0.2 Bitcoin (BTC)Choose your favorite cryptocurrencies, create your winning fantasy portfolio and get prizes in XCB, BITCOIN and NFTs.✅ Big prizes in XCB and BITCOIN.✅ NFT Level 1 for all players.✅ Prizes for 25 winners.** It’s FREE and NO investment required.All Crypto Birds NFTs User Level: https://cryptobirds.medium.com/nft-user-levels-in-opensea-on-polygon-b66a5e1660b4More information: https://cryptobirds.medium.com/round-2-crypto-birds-fantasy-league-ad470501efe
